amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Government Reform and Oversight now printed in the bill.

action.text: Amendment (A017) in the nature of a substitute offered by Government Reform.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Government Reform amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: On agreeing to the Government Reform amendment (A017) Agreed to by Division vote: 132 - 91.
